TITLE: Using Context7 with LLM prompts in plain text
DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use Context7 in natural language prompts by adding 'use context7' to retrieve up-to-date documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
Create a basic Next.js project with app router. use context7
```

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
Create a script to delete the rows where the city is "" given PostgreSQL credentials. use context7
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Context7 MCP via Smithery CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Context7 MCP Server for Claude Desktop automatically using the Smithery CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx -y @smithery/cli install @upstash/context7-mcp --client claude
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Development setup commands for Context7
DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up Context7 development environment, including installing dependencies and building the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bun i
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bun run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Context7 in Cursor MCP settings
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to add Context7 as a global MCP server in Cursor's configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Context7 in VSCode
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to add Context7 as an MCP server in VSCode's configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "servers": {
    "Context7": {
      "type": "stdio",
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Testing Context7 with MCP Inspector
DESCRIPTION: Command to test Context7 using the MCP Inspector tool for verification and debugging.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/inspector npx @upstash/context7-mcp@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Local development configuration for Context7
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for using a local development version of Context7 in MCP clients.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["tsx", "/path/to/folder/context7-mcp/src/index.ts"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Installing Context7 in Claude Code
DESCRIPTION: Command to add Context7 as an MCP server in Claude Code using the claude CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
claude mcp add context7 -- npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp@latest
```

TITLE: Configuring Context7 with Bun for Cursor
DESCRIPTION: Alternative configuration using Bun instead of NPX for running Context7 in Cursor.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "bunx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Context7 with Deno for Cursor
DESCRIPTION: Alternative configuration using Deno to run Context7 in Cursor with appropriate permissions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/upstash/context7/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "deno",
      "args": ["run", "--allow-net", "npm:@upstash/context7-mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```

CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "bunx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```
